method.name: i_cal_recurrence_rscale_is_supported
method.comment: Checks whether rscale is supported.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_rscale_supported_calendars

returns.comment: Array of calendars. Currently always NULL.

method.comment: Gets an array of calendars supporting rscale (currently always return NULL).

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_new_default
i_cal_recurrence_new
method.comment: Creates a new #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: return i_cal_recurrence_new_full(i_cal_recurrence_new_default());

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_clear
method.comment: Resets an #ICalRecurrence.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_day_day_of_week

parameter.name: day
parameter.comment: The encoded day which represents the day of the week and Nth day of the week

returns.comment: The decoded weekday with Monday to be 1.

method.comment: Decodes a day to a weekday in a week.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_day_position

parameter.name: day
parameter.comment: The encoded day which represents the day of the week and Nth day of the week

returns.comment: The decoded day of the week. 0 == any of day of week. 1 == first, 2 = second, -2 == second to last, etc

method.comment: Decodes a day to a position of the weekday.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_month_is_leap

returns.comment: Whether this month is a leap month.

method.comment: Decodes a month and check whether it is a leap month.

returns.comment: The actual month number regardless of the leap flag.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_new_from_string
method.comment: Converts a string to a #ICalRecurrence.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_to_string
method.comment: Converts a #ICalRecurrence to a string.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_until
method.comment: Gets the until from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur), NULL); return i_cal_time_new_full (((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->until);

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_until
method.comment: Sets the until from #ICalRecurrence.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_freq
method.comment: Gets the freq from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur), I_CAL_NO_RECURRENCE); return (ICalRecurrenceFrequency) (((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->freq);

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_freq
method.comment: Sets the freq from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *) i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->freq = (icalrecurrencetype_frequency) freq;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_count
method.comment: Gets the count from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur), 0); return ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->count;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_count
method.comment: Sets the count from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->count = count;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_interval
method.comment: Gets the interval from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur), 0); return ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->interval;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_interval
method.comment: Sets the interval from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->interval = interval;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_week_start
method.comment: Gets the week_start from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur), I_CAL_NO_WEEKDAY); return (ICalRecurrenceWeekday) (((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->week_start);

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_week_start
method.comment: Sets the week_start from #ICalRecurrence.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->week_start = (icalrecurrencetype_weekday) week_start;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_by_second_array
method.comment: Gets the by_second array from #ICalRecurrence. The array size if I_CAL_BY_SECOND_SIZE.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_by_second_array
method.comment: Sets the by_second array in @recur at once. The array size can be less than I_CAL_BY_SECOND_SIZE. Shorter arrays are terminated with I_CAL_RECURRENCE_ARRAY_MAX value, longer arrays are truncated.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_get_by_second

parameter.name: index
parameter.comment: The index in by_second of #ICalRecurrence, less than %I_CAL_BY_SECOND_SIZE

method.comment: Gets the by_second value at index @index. The index should be less than %I_CAL_BY_SECOND_SIZE.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_set_by_second

parameter.name: index
parameter.comment: The index in by_second of #ICalRecurrence, less than I_CAL_BY_SECOND_SIZE

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The value to be set into by_second of #ICalRecurrence

method.comment: Sets the by_second array from #ICalRecurrence at the given index. The array size is I_CAL_BY_SECOND_SIZE.
